content: this is a quick and easy knit - perfect for long-striping or handpainted yarns the pattern has been written to have as few purl row as possible for those who prefer knitting to purling many thanks to the testers for their great knits and photos she-craftstudio mdcm mireille7 claudianz kaystarr mom2cagc hannahpark roseknits24-7 emxlenie crazybaglady qtpieknitter gilly amerai swamplake smlwlooknit bikerbitch69 pouassonlune stampingjoan nonaofsav jammam susixs kimmies-knits
